conclusion: Preliminary objection joined to merits (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies) and dismissed;Violation of Art. 6-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF SUKOBLJEVIC v. CROATIA - [Russian Translation]
issue: Constitunial Court Act (2002) ; Civil Procedure Act, section 212(1) and 215 (1) ; Bankruptcy Act
scl: Antonic-Tomasovic v. Croatia, no. 5208/03, §§ 25-34, 10 November 2005;Cocchiarella v. Italy [GC], no. 64886/01, § 68, § 82, § 103, ECHR 2006-…;Frydlender v. France [GC], no. 30979/96, § 43, ECHR 2000-VII;Slavicek v. Croatia (dec.), no. 20862/02, ECHR 2002-VII
